name: places/ChIJAfPxALtZwokRaZY97uuWLq4
formattedAddress: 248 W 23rd St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 248 W 23rd St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: Highly disappointed in the service. They sent my tax return to the wrong banking account when they insisted they hadn't. When asked for help to solve this, they said it would be fixed automatically (which it was not and still hasn't been solved), and then they stopped responding my emails. Will change tax preparer next year. DO NOT RECOMMEND.

text.text: Highly disappointed in the service. They sent my tax return to the wrong banking account when they insisted they hadn't. When asked for help to solve this, they said it would be fixed automatically (which it was not and still hasn't been solved), and then they stopped responding my emails. Will change tax preparer next year. DO NOT RECOMMEND.

originalText.text: I scheduled an appointment to have a simple 2021 W-2 state filing (no claims or deductions) at store #30292 on W23rd. When I arrived on time for my appointment with Pulak, I was escorted back to his office. Shortly after, Isaac Nyarko arrived in Pulak’s office and told me I had to go and that they were too busy for me. When I told him I had an appointment, he told me that Pulak did not have the skill set to do a simple W-2 state filing.  Isaac Nyarko was rude, refused to give me his last name or offer me any resolution. This is the most basic filing!  The store’s manager, Ariel booked the appointment with me in-person.  I am confused, disappointed and offended by Issac’s unprofessional behavior and refusal of service. His office was empty when I walked by it on the way out and there was nobody waiting in the lobby, so he couldn’t have been that busy. I will be filing formal complaints with corporate next.

originalText.text: I have worked with Carolyn Baehr at your 23rd street location in Manhattan for the past four years and I always look forward to seeing her. She is excellent at explaining everything step by step and gives great advice. Besides that, she is so personable and warm and I continually recommend her to whoever I can.

text.text: I have worked with Carolyn Baehr at your 23rd street location in Manhattan for the past four years and I always look forward to seeing her. She is excellent at explaining everything step by step and gives great advice. Besides that, she is so personable and warm and I continually recommend her to whoever I can.

originalText.text: Scheduled an appointment for 9am this morning only to find that this location was CLOSED!  (see screenshot for confirmation e-mail). I called customer service and, after finally getting a person on the other end of the phone, was offered only an apology, a promise to "report" the tech issue,  and told that it looked like I had an appointment scheduled for tomorrow at 11:15am? I would never have scheduled an appointment for this time as it is in the middle of my workday. The online system is completely messed up.  I am so frustrated, confused, and wet from standing outside in the rain. Really frustrated. **EDIT: After receiving a response from Block Advisors to this review, I called the number they provided (which I knew was the exact same number I already mentioned calling in my review from yesterday) to attempt to schedule another appointment. This time I spoke directly with staff, and again was given confusion information that contradicted what the prior customer service agent had told me yesterday. It was all such a disorganized mess that I politely ended the call and decided to get help with taxes elsewhere.

originalText.text: Cheryl Friedman, my H&R advisor for the past 3 years. Thank you, Cheryl for  your patience, professionalism, and dutiful advice.
